title: Senior Manager - Talent Acquisition
jobDescription:
Responsibilities:


- Must have work experience in digitization, automation and engineering industry.

- Ensure effective usage of the standard global IT landscape to efficiently execute recruiting administration

- Drive recruiting specific transactions such as intake meetings, assessments interviews for applications in process, active sourcing for roles, offer & negotiation, workflows, candidate engagement etc

- Supports development and implements recruiting standards in order to ensure effective staffing in the organization.

- Ensures adherence to defined TA guidelines, processes, and procedures, systems & tools and ensures achievement of agreed performance standards

- Keeps up to date on the latest techniques and developments in sourcing (including online and offline methods), and actively demonstrates this in practice

- Build engaging relationships with all stakeholders through trust, teamwork and direct communication

- Use facts, knowledge, experience and critical reasoning to develop solutions with the stakeholders

- Experience in using applicant tracking system

- Independent, self-motivated, with strong communication, interpersonal and negotiation skills

title: Business Unit Lead - Talent Acquisition - Manufacturing
jobDescription:
Business Unit Lead - Talent Acquisition - Manufacturing / Infrastructure

Requirements:

- 9 to15 years of end to end Talent acquisition experience

- Supports development and implements recruiting standards in order to ensure effective staffing in the organization

- Develops, proposes and implements Talent Acquisition policies, methods, processes, programs, and advises managers and employees accordingly

- Ensures adherence to defined Talent Acquisition guidelines, processes and procedures, systems & tools and ensures achievement of agreed performance standards

- Support plans and executes projects/initiatives to improve recruiting processes.

- Drive recruiting specific transactions such as intake meetings, assessments & P&O interviews for applications in process, active sourcing for roles, offer & negotiation, workflows, candidate engagement etc

- Responds to routine/non routine inquiries from hiring managers & applicants on operational and at escalation level

- Ensure effective usage of the standard global IT landscape to efficiently execute recruiting administration

title: Food Stylist
jobDescription:
Job Purpose

We are seeking a talented and experienced Food Stylist who has a deep understanding of content production and production design. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, a passion for food, and the ability to create visually appealing food presentations that align with our brands aesthetic and objectives.

Key Responsibilities:

Food Styling:
Conceptualize and execute visually appealing food presentations for photography and videography.
Collaborate with chefs, photographers, and videographers to achieve the desired look and feel.
Prepare and style food items to be camera-ready, ensuring they look fresh and appetising.
Content Production:
Work closely with the content production team to understand project requirements and objectives.
Participate in brainstorming sessions to generate creative ideas for food styling and presentation.
Assist in the planning and execution of photoshoots and video shoots, ensuring all elements are in place and on schedule.

Production Design:
Design and set up visually compelling food scenes and backgrounds.
Select props, backgrounds, and accessories that enhance the food presentation and align with the brands aesthetic.
Ensure all design elements are cohesive and contribute to the overall visual story.
Collaboration and Communication:
Communicate effectively with team members, including photographers, videographers, content creators, and marketing professionals.
Provide input and feedback on creative concepts and visual storytelling.
Work collaboratively to ensure all projects meet high-quality standards and are delivered on time.

Innovation and Trends:
Stay updated on current food styling trends, techniques, and best practices.
Experiment with new styling methods and techniques to keep content fresh and innovative.
Share knowledge and insights with the team to foster a culture of creativity and continuous improvement.

Location:Panvel,Kalyan Dombivili

title: FMCG Sales Representative | Corporate
tagsAndSkills: FMCG Sales,Lead generation,Customer follow up,Field Sales Executive,Relationship building,Closing Deals,Territory Management,Sales
jobDescription:
1)Actively seek out new customers and establish relationships to promote and sell our FMCG products.

2)Present, demonstrate, and explain the features and benefits of our products to potential customers.

3)Achieve sales targets and objectives by effectively managing the sales process from prospecting to closing deals.

4)Build and maintain strong relationships with existing customers to ensure customer satisfaction and repeat business.

5)Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences to identify opportunities for growth.

6) Provide excellent customer service by addressing customer inquiries, resolving complaints, and ensuring timely delivery of orders.

7) Provide excellent customer service by addressing customer inquiries, resolving complaints, and ensuring timely delivery of orders.

8)Collaborate with the sales team and other departments to develop sales strategies and achieve company goals.

9) Prepare sales reports, forecasts, and analysis to track performance and provide insights for improvement.

10) Stay up-to-date with industry trends, product knowledge, and market developments to effectively communicate with customers.

1. Negotiation 2. Closing Sales 3. Convincing skill 4. Mandatory to have a laptop. 5.Mandatory to have fluency in English communication.

title: Job Opportunity For the Security Supervisor (Ex Service Man)
jobDescription:
Accurately reporting all incidents to senior managers. Preventing and detecting offense  
on site.  
• Monitoring CC tv cameras and other recording systems.  
• Managing the lost and found as per the company policies & procedure.  
• Using the correct radio voice procedure.  
• Liaising with the emergency services, police, ambulance and fie service to resolve.  
• Making sure that no unauthorized personnel enter restricted areas.  
• Answering queries from visitors to the shopping Centre.

• Accurately updating administrative records and sheets.
